name: Conveyor Belt
desc: A conveyor belt powered by magic, streamlining automation in the alchemy industry.

name: Inclined Conveyor Belt
desc: A conveyor belt that can send items to high or low places.

name: Inclined Conveyor Belt
desc: A conveyor belt that can send items to high or low places.

name: Inclined Conveyor Belt
desc: A conveyor belt that can send items to high or low places.

name: Inclined Conveyor Belt
desc: A conveyor belt that can send items to high or low places.

name: Catapult
desc: A catapult that can throw items onto shelves or hopper conveyors, with angle and distance restrictions.

name: Conveyor Lifter
desc: A logistics device for transporting items vertically. Drag to adjust height. Can be switched to move items upwards or downwards.

name: Conveyor Lifter
desc: A logistics device for transporting items vertically. Drag to adjust height. Can be switched to move items upwards or downwards.

name: Pipeline
desc: Pipeline for transporting liquids, configurable in vertical or horizontal mode.

name: Pipeline
desc: Pipeline for transporting liquids, configurable in vertical or horizontal mode.

name: Track
desc: Iron tracks for factory vehicles.

name: Curved Track
desc: Iron tracks for factory vehicles.

name: Curved Track
desc: Iron tracks for factory vehicles.

name: Banked Track
desc: Iron tracks for factory vehicles.

name: Banked Track
desc: Iron tracks for factory vehicles.

name: Ascent Track
desc: Iron tracks for factory vehicles.

name: Descent Track
desc: Iron tracks for factory vehicles.

name: Ascent Track
desc: Iron tracks for factory vehicles.

name: Descent Track
desc: Iron tracks for factory vehicles.

name: Cannon
desc: An advanced catapult with no angle restrictions, longer throw distance, and two conveyor belt inputs.

name: Drawbridge Conveyor
desc: A special conveyor belt pulled by linen ropes, requiring no extra support.

name: Drawbridge Conveyor
desc: A special conveyor belt pulled by linen ropes, requiring no extra support.

name: Tunnel Conveyor
desc: A conveyor passage that can be mounted on walls.

name: Tunnel Conveyor
desc: A conveyor passage that can be mounted on walls.

name: Filter Splitter
desc: A splitter designed to filter out chosen items.

name: Filter Splitter
desc: A splitter designed to filter out chosen items.

name: Filter Splitter
desc: A splitter designed to filter out chosen items.

name: Hopper Conveyor
desc: Designed to catch thrown items, it features a single conveyor belt output.

name: Scale
desc: Features one conveyor belt input and two conveyor belt outputs. Input coins or raw materials are split evenly into the two outputs.

name: Priority Splitter
desc: Features one conveyor belt input and two conveyor belt outputs. Input items are prioritized for the first output.

name: Priority Splitter
desc: Features one conveyor belt input and two conveyor belt outputs. Input items are prioritized for the first output.

name: Priority Splitter
desc: Features one conveyor belt input and two conveyor belt outputs. Input items are prioritized for the first output.

name: Priority Merger
desc: Features two conveyor belt inputs and one conveyor belt output. Items put into the first input are prioritized.

name: Priority Merger
desc: Features two conveyor belt inputs and one conveyor belt output. Items put into the first input are prioritized.

name: Priority Merger
desc: Features two conveyor belt inputs and one conveyor belt output. Items put into the first input are prioritized.

name: Bounce Shroom
desc: A bouncy mushroom that can launch you high into the air after you step on it.

name: Grinder
desc: Automated grinding device with one conveyor belt input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Enhanced Grinder
desc: A more efficient grinder, working at twice the speed of a regular one.

name: Crucible
desc: Automated heating device that can only be built on a furnace, with one conveyor belt input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Stackable Crucible
desc: An automated heater that transfers heat to the device above it.

name: Extractor
desc: Automated extraction device with one conveyor belt input and one pipeline output.

name: Thermal Extractor
desc: An advanced Extractor with an added heating module. The higher up it's built, the greater its output.

name: Refiner
desc: An automated refining device with two conveyor belt inputs and one conveyor belt output.

name: Refiner
desc: An automated refining device with two conveyor belt inputs and one conveyor belt output.

name: Paradox Crucible
desc: A passive heating device that can refine any material into oblivion essence. Different materials will take different amounts of time to refine.

name: Knowledge Altar
desc: A device that can withdraw alchemy knowledge automatically from Relics and upgrade knowledge level, with one conveyor belt input.

name: Processor
desc: An advanced processing device that requires a recipe. It has one conveyor belt input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Processor
desc: An advanced processing device that requires a recipe. It has one conveyor belt input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Kiln
desc: An advanced heating device that requires a recipe. It can only be built on a furnace, with one conveyor belt input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Blender
desc: An advanced Blender that requires a recipe. It has one conveyor belt input, one pipeline input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Assembler
desc: An advanced processing device that requires a recipe. It has two conveyor belt inputs and one conveyor belt output.

name: Assembler
desc: An advanced processing device that requires a recipe. It has two conveyor belt inputs and one conveyor belt output.

name: Alembic
desc: An alembic that requires a recipe. It can only be built on a furnace, with one conveyor belt input, one pipeline input and one pipeline output.

name: Athanor
desc: An advanced athanor with a chance of failure. It has two conveyor outputs, and failed products go through the second output.

name: Athanor
desc: An advanced athanor with a chance of failure. It has two conveyor outputs, and failed products go through the second output.

name: Advanced Blender
desc: An advanced blender that requires a recipe. It has two conveyor belt inputs, one pipeline input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Advanced Blender
desc: An advanced blender that requires a recipe. It has two conveyor belt inputs, one pipeline input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Advanced Alembic
desc: An advanced alembic that requires a recipe. It can only be built on a furnace, with two conveyor belt inputs, one pipeline input and one pipeline output.

name: Advanced Alembic
desc: An advanced alembic that requires a recipe. It can only be built on a furnace, with two conveyor belt inputs, one pipeline input and one pipeline output.

name: Advanced Assembler
desc: An advanced processing device that requires a recipe. It has three conveyor belt inputs, one pipeline input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Advanced Athanor
desc: An advanced athanor with a chance of failure. It has three conveyor outputs, and failed products go through a second or third output.

name: Shaper
desc: An advanced shaper that requires a recipe. It has six conveyor belt inputs and one conveyor belt output, and the product is crafted gradually as materials are fed in.

name: Advanced Shaper
desc: An advanced shaper requires that a recipe. It has five conveyor belt inputs, two pipeline inputs and one conveyor belt output, and the product is crafted gradually as materials are fed in.

name: Arcane Shaper
desc: An advanced shaper that requires a recipe. It has nine conveyor belt inputs and one conveyor belt output, and the product is crafted gradually as materials are fed in.

name: Cauldron
desc: A traditional alchemy device that takes any three materials and refines them into one unknown material. Some old alchemists still insist on using it.

name: Arcane Processor
desc: An advanced processing device that requires a recipe. It has one conveyor belt input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Stone Furnace
desc: A simple heating device. After adding fuel, the devices above the stone furnace can be heated. Fuel can be automatically refilled through a conveyor belt.

name: Blast Furnace
desc: An advanced heating device with a larger heating area. It can automatically refill fuel through a conveyor belt.

name: Wooden Table
desc: A simple wooden table for displaying your Lab devices.

name: Wooden Box
desc: A wooden box for stacking miscellaneous items — it might be a good alternative when a wooden table is too big.

name: Medium Shelf
desc: A shelf with two slots for displaying and selling sundries.

name: Checkout Table
desc: A checkout counter where customers complete their purchases. Install a Cashier to enable automatic checkout.

name: Large Shelf
desc: A shelf with three slots for displaying and selling sundries.

name: Potion Shelf
desc: A shelf with four slots for displaying and selling potions.

name: Jewelry Shelf
desc: A shelf with three slots for displaying and selling jewelries.

name: Wooden Bed
desc: A wooden bed you can sleep on until the next day — no overtime today.

name: Track Station
desc: A factory tour station that launches sightseeing carts after both track ends are connected and Transformation Potions are stocked. Customers are required to pay tickets and tips.

name: Relic Shelf
desc: A shelf of adjustable size for displaying and selling relics.

name: Wooden Platform
desc: A small platform half a floor high.

name: Wooden Stairs
desc: A small staircase with the height of half a floor.

name: Wooden Floor
desc: A modular wooden floor which can have its size toggled.

name: Wooden Floor
desc: A modular wooden floor which can have its size toggled.

name: Wooden Wall
desc: Modular wooden wall that can be switched to a form with a door or a window.

name: Wooden Wall
desc: Modular wooden wall that can be switched to a form with a door or a window.

name: Stone Wall
desc: Modular wooden wall that can be switched to a form with a door or a window.

name: Gable Wall
desc: Modular wooden wall that can be switched to a form with a door or a window.

name: Sloped Roof
desc: Weather-resistant shingles on a plank base. Simple assembly, full protection.

name: Sloped Roof
desc: Weather-resistant shingles on a plank base. Simple assembly, full protection.

name: Stone Wall
desc: A modular stone wall that can be switched to forms with a door or a window.

name: Wooden Railing
desc: Wooden railing with sturdy structure and practical use.

name: Wooden Railing
desc: Wooden railing with sturdy structure and practical use.

name: Wooden Stairs
desc: A wood staircase half a floor high.

name: Pillar
desc: A steel-reinforced pillar that can provide support for the floors.

name: Table Saw
desc: It consumes Logs to produce planks, with one conveyor belt input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Stone Crusher
desc: It consumes limestone to produce rubbles, and has one conveyor belt input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Seed Plot
desc: A planting plot. After using plant seeds, you can wait to harvest.

name: Iron Smelter
desc: It consumes iron ore to smelt iron ingots and can only be built on a furnace and has a conveyor belt output.

name: Nursery
desc: An automatic herbal production device. Spread seeds and add fertilizer to grow the corresponding herbs.

name: World Tree Nursery
desc: A Nursery used specially to grow a World Tree. It consumes Fertilizer at a set rate and has nine conveyor belt inputs and one conveyor belt output.

name: Purchasing Portal
desc: A purchasing portal available only to senior members of the Alchemy Association. Input the required money to acquire the corresponding items.

name: Bank Portal
desc: A device used to convert back and forth between two different coins, with the ability to set the amount of coins output each time.

name: Dispatch Portal
desc: A portal that can send goods to the purchaser and receive payment. The corresponding purchase contract must first be unlocked.

name: Small Storage Box
desc: A small storage box configurable in multiple modes, with one conveyor belt input and one conveyor belt output.

name: Large Storage Box
desc: Automated storage box with two conveyor belt inputs and two conveyor belt outputs.

name: Metal Storage Box
desc: A metal-reinforced advanced automated storage box with larger capacity.

name: Conical Flask
desc: A small Flask for liquids, with a pipeline input, switchable between a conical flask and a round-bottom flask.

name: Round-bottom Flask
desc: A small Flask for liquids, with a pipeline input, switchable between a conical flask and a round-bottom flask.

name: Sphere Liquid Flask
desc: A spherical flask for storing liquids, with four pipeline connections.

name: Trash Barrel
desc: A trash barrel with four conveyor belt inputs, emptied each night.

name: Lab Stands
desc: Essential laboratory stands for efficient production-line setup.

name: Beam
desc: An auxiliary structure that only needs to be supported on both ends to build and that can be converted to different lengths.

name: Metal Stand
desc: Metal-framed laboratory stand with enhanced durability.

name: Metal Stand
desc: Metal-framed laboratory stand with enhanced durability.

name: Reinforced Platform
desc: A nailed wood-metal reinforced platform for production line expansion.

name: Reinforced Platform
desc: A nailed wood-metal reinforced platform for production line expansion.

name: Reinforced Platform
desc: A nailed wood-metal reinforced platform for production line expansion.

name: Wooden Shelf
desc: Wall-mounted support device that greatly improves space utilization.

name: Candle
desc: A simple lighting device that can be placed or wall-mounted.

name: Notice Board
desc: A freely editable notice board that can be switched to a wall-mounted form.

name: Notice Board
desc: A freely editable notice board that can be switched to a wall-mounted form.

name: Automatic Cashier
desc: A cashier with automatic checkout. It stops working when the coin limit is reached and features two conveyor belts.

name: Workbench
desc: A workbench for crafting and upgrading accessories.

name: Inventory Expansion
desc: Inventory Capacity
